file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Elevator Pitch API
  description: API Description for the Elevator Pitch API endpoints
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:3001
    description: Local development server. Clone, install, and serve the code to test.
  - url: https://elevator-pitch-space.herokuapp.com
    description: Live deployed production server running on heroku, connected to JawsDB.
paths:
  /api/user/login:
    post:
      tags:
        - User
      description: POST to log in to the site
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                email:
                  type: string
                  example: johndoe@gmail.com
                password:
                  type: string
                  example: password
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
        '400':
          description: Error
  /api/space/{space_id}/idea/{idea_id}/abandon:
    put:
      tags:
        - Ideas
      description: PUT to abandon an owned idea
      parameters:
        - name: space_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: idea_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
            minimum: 1
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
        '400':
          description: Error
  /api/space/{space_id}/idea/{idea_id}/claim:
    put:
      tags:
        - Ideas
      description: PUT to claim an abandoned idea
      parameters:
        - name: space_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: idea_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
            minimum: 1
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
        '400':
          description: Error
